short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Best extension for symbols, text symbols and text emojis with one click copy and paste option

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use these Symbols, text symbols and emoji symbols in different tasks like messaging, commenting, mailing etc. on social media such as Facebook, Instagram, twitter etc. There are different types of symbols:
1. Arrows Symbols
2. Heart and Love Symbols
3. Stars Symbols
4. Math Symbols
5. Currency Symbols
6. Number Symbols
6. Chinese Symbols
7. Latin Symbols 

This extension provides the easy access to these symbols by just clicking on the symbols it will get copied and you can paste and use anywhere you want.
